mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.username, t2.real_name, t2.gender, t1.phone, t2.email, t1.create_time, t1.account_status from sys_admin t1, sys_admin_info t2 where t1.id = t2.admin_id and t1.deleted = 0 and t2.deleted = 0
select post_id from sys_admin_post where admin_id = #{adminId} and deleted = 0
select department_id from sys_admin_department where admin_id = ${adminId} and deleted = 0
select * from sys_admin t1, sys_admin_info t2 where t1.id = t2.admin_id and t1.id not in (#{id}) and t1.deleted = 0 and t2.deleted = 0
